Control Name: 2.3.7 There are well defined performance requirements for the application and key scenarios
Control Statement: Are there well defined performance requirements for the application and/or key scenarios?

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.3 Have you defined key scenarios for your workload and how they relate to operational targets and non-functional requirements?
